channel.title: Comments on: Girl Talk’s Gregg Gillis Talks

item.title: By: Andrew Wise
item.dc:creator: Andrew Wise
item.content:encoded:
Grooveshark followed Greg on his Florida tour first in Gainesville, then Orlando, Tampa, and finally in Miami. Grooveshark even saved the Miami show from being cancelled.

We had a chance to sit down with Greg this past week and discuss the tour, getting laid in the bathroom, and his views on piracy.

http://www.grooveshark.com/blog/2008/02/11/the-essential-girl-talk-experience-an-interview-with-gregg-gillis/
